A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This is a movie I actually agree with the critics over the fans. Of all the franchises\, Marvel/DC/Harry potter etc. Star Wars fans are the most overreacting bunch. You'd think their childhood was ruined. For 2 years fans built up their own plots and theories and since it didn't go their way they whine about it. That aside. It was a fun movie. I thought it had a good plot to set up the next film.  I won't spoil anything\, but go see it. It's worth it.
